sentences.sContent: For half an hour, up and down the streets, around corners and into alleyways, Karen Lodrick, frightened but determined, pursued the woman with the suede coat.
sentences.sContent_eng: For half an hour, up and down the streets, around corners and into alleyways, Karen Lodrick, frightened but determined, pursued the woman with the suede coat.
sentences.sCn: 接近半个小时在大街上跑来跑去，串街走巷，凯伦虽然害怕却很坚定，一直追着穿仿麂皮外套的女人不放。
